'''The Simpsons Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2015/02/27/games-simpsons-meet-minecraft-on-xbox/|title=The Simpsons Meet Minecraft Xbox One and Xbox 360 Editions Today|date=February 27, 2015|website=Xbox Wire|author=Xbox Wire Staff}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] containing 24 skins of characters from the animated sitcom ''{{Wikipedia|The Simpsons}}'' and was available on [[Legacy Console Edition]]s until May 30, 2017. Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already on Xbox consoles when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>
